learned: CRITICAL: NEVER report P&L from wallet USDC alone. Must check: USDC + conditional tokens + NegRisk tokens + CLOB open orders. Use wallet_audit.py.

CRITICAL: NegRisk sells require client.update_balance_allowance() BEFORE posting sell order. CLOB balance cache goes stale.
